resources.string: Set the user profile when calculating body fat percentage
The unit is cm, ranging from 40 to 240cm
Support was limited to people over 10 and under 80. For people under 10, only weight and BMI data were valid
When you select "first time", each device will return only once per scan. When you select "every time", each device may call back several times per scan, but the signal strength will be different

Kg default value 
, all scales can support this unit 
 jins, weighing end if not support, will show kg 
 ST is stone, weighing end if not support lb
You are less than 10 years old, and you cannot get accurate measurements during the test
After setting the time, no bluetooth device is scanned within the specified time, and an error message is called back

Scan duration, unit ms, default is 0, that is, keep scanning, unless the APP calls stopBleDeviceDiscovery. If not 0, the minimum value is 3000ms, then the scan will be automatically stopped after a duration ms.

string-array.name: user_goal_des
string-array.item: Strength exercises, such as machine exercises
Good foundation, but no systematic training

resources.string: The set unit cannot be empty
The current device that needs to be set cannot be empty
Please enter body fat change control
Please complete the first weight measurement as the comparison data of the second measurement
The user only measured once and did not compare the previous data
Please fill in the correct weight of clothes
Please enter the correct valid time
Please fill in the correct scan time
Please fill in the correct scan timeout
Please fill in the correct connection timeout

Note :(0 is kg, default value 1 is lb, lb, all scales can support this unit 2 is kg, if the scale end does not support, it will show kg 3 is st, quartzite, if the scale end does not support, it will show lb, value)
This function is only valid for two-way broadcast scale
User generated dual mode storage data
Athlete mode, suitable for regular exercise users
The user clothing weight will be removed when calculating various indicators
The effective time of qr code scanning, the default is 0s, indicating that the effective time is not verified
Choose the appropriate bluetooth management mode according to your actual situation
enhanced bluetooth broadcast (only useful for broadcast scales)
Please fill in the correct weight data
Verify the binding of the phone
Return true if the last phone was also tied to it, or false if not
When connecting the Wrist for the first time, call the bind Wrist command. If the bound Wrist is called by another user, the Wrist will break the connection
This method is called during the binding process to cancel the binding process
When the Wrist is no longer in use, call the detachable command, and the Wrist will be disconnected after the detachable command
Set the Wrist time to the current time
Setting the Wrist user will affect the health data
Returns device information for the Wrist
Obtain real-time data recorded by the bracelet
Get the running fitness data that the bracelet has recorded so far for the day
Get the Wrist historical running health data as of early this morning
Set alarm clocks, up to 10 alarm clocks can be set
Setting goals will display the movement goals you set and the achievement status on the Wrist
Enter your target number of steps, the Wrist default 5000 steps
Set the measurement of the Wrist
Set the Wrist unit, language, etc., and the bracelet will display your set movement goals and achievements
Heart rate monitoring mode, manual detection by default, set to automatic mode can always detect heart rate
Search mobile phone function, the default is off, set to open, you can use the search mobile phone function on the ring
The photo taking function is off by default and set to on. You can use the photo taking function on the hand ring
Wrist lift recognition, off by default, set to on, the bracelet will light up when triggering wrist lift
Resetting the Wrist configuration will reset the specified configuration to the default state
Restarting the Wrist will reset all configuration to the default
This method only supports ID 0003 and version 12 and subsequent versions (including version 12)
Jumps to the corresponding interface setting and sends the specified text
Jump to the corresponding interface Settings, specify the phone
Set heart rate switch and interval
The default setting is automatic mode, setting heart rate interval
The switch is set to on by default to set the heart rate reminder value
The example sets the start and end of the run for the APP
The APP sends running data, and this command can be sent regularly after running is started
The interaction cannot begin until the Wrist is ready
The Wrist is not connected, please connect the Wrist first!
Trigger to stop looking for the phone
The device returns the modified exercise status
Please select the upgraded Bin file first
This test sedentary remind every other
This test reset alarm clock, target, measurement, sedentary reminder, looking for mobile phone, wrist lift recognition, automatic detection
On automatic heart rate detection, on wrist lifting recognition, on searching for mobile phone, on anti-loss reminder, step number target 4000,24 hours, metric system, Chinese
You need to wait for Recylerview to stop sliding before setting
Whether the current Wrist is the same as the device previously bound:
The unit is kg, ranging from 0 to 150kg, excluding 0
Set whether the wrist lifting identification is on
Error setting heart rate interval data
Error setting heart rate alert data
